comments.raw_text:
At the moment the formatting toolbar in the mail composition window is not customisable.

This first patch does some preparation work by:
1/ moving those elements that are not toolbarbuttons into toolbaritems.
2/ moving from using the toolbar id to apply the style to the elements to using a class.
